organizations.name: Raqib50
organizations.description: Co-founder of Raqib50, an online parliament watch that holds Kuwaiti parliamentarians accountable by making their voting records and data accessible to the public.

organizations.name: Siyaaq
organizations.description: Co-founder of Siyaaq, an interdisciplinary and socially-driven research and consultancy company by using mixed methods to provide objective and critical research services.

organizations.name: en.v
organizations.description: Research & policy advisor at en.v, a culturally diverse organization focusing on community-building through programs with youth, community leaders, educators, policy makers, and others.
